text:
I am using POI 3.11 library to split pptx in to individual slides. It works fine when there are no hyperlinks (links point to different slides). However, when I try to split when there is a hyper link, 

1. it is not able to read the exact number of slides.
2. The split does happen but it is not proper.

If there are more than 1 link also, the split doesn't work.

Can you pls check.
creator: manjusindagi@rediffmail.com

text: Can you attach a sample file and some self-sufficient piece of code that reproduces this problem?
creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at

text: No update on the question, therefore closing this with LATER until more informatoin is available.
